course: React - The Complete Guide (incl. React Router & Redux)
description: I got pretty familiar with React and Next.js from what I learned through this course. Also improved my styling skills. I paused once I found a dev job, that's why certificate is missing

Started from the complete zero - I learned how to create web apps with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Also had a small introduction of React basics. As this was a Full stack course, I gained some minor back-end knowledge with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, SQL
This was also a free course by a local academy and I signed up to see if back-end is my developer path

This was a free course and I decided to give it a try. And thats where it all started. I fell inlove with coding and then continue pursuing it. Learned variables and constants, types of variables, arrays, objects, if-else & switch statements, for & while loops.
